text: State University of Minas Gerais (Universidade do Estado de Minas Gerais, short UEMG) is a public university of the Brazilian state of Minas Gerais. Established in 1989, it is the second largest university in Minas Gerais as well as one the most prestigious universities in this state. Category:Colleges and universities in Brazil Category:Minas Gerais Category:1989 establishments in Brazil
title: Minas Gerais State University
